actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide operating assistance for projects located in areas other than urbanized areas.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize the use of funds made available under such Act for projects in area other than urbanized areas, for the payment of subsidies for operating expenses in such areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to provide operating assistance for projects located in areas other than urbanized areas.
